wikipedia_page.main: Peter Tasker Sowden (1 May 1929 – 12 November 2010) was an English professional footballer. His clubs included Aldershot,  Accrington Stanley, Wrexham and Gillingham, where he made over 130 Football League appearances.He also played for Chorley, Great Harwood and Mossley.

response: * Paddy Sowden, Peter Tasker Sowden (1929–2010), English (soccer) footballer
